name: Commander Flag
blurb: Incredibly fun and addictive, Commander Flag brings a new style of puzzle packed with action to mobile platforms.

rewards.reward: Pledge $1 and you will receive our most sincere thanks. Every little helps, and your support is very important for us. Thank you.
Pledge $5 and receive in-game cash equivalent to $10! You can use in-game cash to buy new helpers, improved defenses for your base, improve your nation and unlock new levels!

A chance for a direct participation in the development! If you pledge $15 or more, you will receive the $5 reward plus a chance to voice one of the enemy characters in our game! Imagine yourself bragging to your friends "Do you hear that sound of awesomeness? That's my voice!". We will inform you of the possible sentences and phrases and you can interpret em in any way you like, and we will choose the best recordings for each character!

Additionally to the previous rewards, your name will be forever on the game`s credits as a funder in the Kickstarter section. You will also receive an impressive wallpaper featuring Flag and the terrible hedgehogs in an epic battle.

You will receive all rewards mentioned above and additionally a digital art book containing sketches and concept art of all the stuff that is in the game. You will be able to see how the game evolved from a simple idea involving balls and a bar into something fun and unique!

You will receive all rewards mentioned above and additionally a PDF with the schematics of a papercraft of some of the game characters. Can you imagine how awesome it would be to have on your desk a miniature of the ancient berserker?

Additionally to all the previous rewards, you will receive an exclusive poster AND t-shirt of the game! These will be a limited edition, made only for Kickstarter Supporters! Be one of the few to proudly walk around showing off your participation on the project with this awesome t-shirt!

You will receive all rewards mentioned above and additionally you will be able to create a new hedgehog with us! Choose its helmet and facial expression, for example, do you like ninjas? We can make one of the hedgehogs look like one! Would you like to see a Darth Vader version of a hedgehog? You can make it happen!

Choose a theme for a special level! If you pledge $300, you will receive the $140 and below rewards AND you will be able to choose a theme for a special level dedicated to you! Anything you like, for example "Colosseum", "Space ships", "Ninja Temple", anything at all, and we will figure a way to put your name and an image based on you, like a statue, a photograph, something that fits your choice.

Become a specialist anteater! If you pledge $500 or more, you will receive the $140 and below rewards AND you will become one of the helpers of our hero Flag! Your name will be shown on the Item Store alongside Ralbert Reinstein`s, and we will create a character based on one of your pictures! Also, we will inform you of the sentences and phrases spoken by your character and YOU will be able to voice it! Imagine how cool it would be to see all your friends requiring your aid to defeat the terrible hedgehogs!

Your name will always be remembered in our headquarters... your contribution will be in our hearts forever.... and additionally to our infinite gratitude, you will receive all the rewards including and below $500, and also we would be more then happy to meet with you for lunch any time, any day. (We are in S\u00e3o Paulo, Brazil). Also, you will have full access to the game in its development stage and we will constantly send you builds and be eager to hear your opinion on every aspect of the game. You will be truly a member of our team to discuss anything.
